app.title: First Family RAG
app.description: Client-facing RAG dashboard powered by n8n and First Family intelligence.

home.liveStatus: Live · First Family RAG on n8n
home.title: Your family's private AI that actually remembers.
home.subtitle: Ask anything about your documents, voice notes, and plans. First Family RAG runs on n8n, streams answers token-by-token, and shows exactly which sources it used.
home.poweredBy: Powered by First Family on n8n
home.tipText: Ask: "What's everything we still need to book for this trip?"

dashboard.title: RAG control room
dashboard.subtitle: Live metrics from your n8n-powered retrieval workflow. Monitor indexed documents, query volume, and latency before you dive into a new conversation.
dashboard.fromFirstToken: From first token to final answer
dashboard.howToUse: How to use First Family RAG
dashboard.howToStart: How do I start a conversation?
dashboard.howToStartAnswer: Go to Chat and ask natural-language questions about your indexed documents. The n8n workflow returns grounded answers from your RAG index.
dashboard.howToAdd: How do I add new documents?
dashboard.howToAddAnswer: Use the Upload view to drag & drop PDFs or CSVs. They are parsed and synced into the RAG pipeline via n8n.
dashboard.whatMetrics: What do the metrics above represent?
dashboard.whatMetricsAnswer: Docs indexed tracks how many documents are in the RAG index, Queries answered shows chat volume, and Avg latency measures how fast answers come back from n8n.
dashboard.canErase: Can I erase the indexed documents?
dashboard.canEraseAnswer: Yes — use the erase indexed docs control on the right to request a reset of the RAG index via n8n.
dashboard.tipText: Use /chat to talk to your RAG knowledge base, /upload to add files or scrape websites with Gemini AI, and this dashboard to monitor your indexed documents.

chat.title: First Family · Conversation
chat.subtitle: RAG chat
chat.placeholder: Ask anything about your family docs, plans, and notes...

upload.title: Feed your RAG memory
upload.subtitle: Drop PDFs, plans, and notes — or scrape any webpage with Gemini AI.
upload.dragDrop: Drag & drop PDFs, docs, or notes
upload.dragDropSubtitle: Your files are sent directly to the First Family n8n RAG workflow for indexing.
upload.uploadFailed: Upload failed. Check the n8n upload webhook URL.
upload.scrapeTitle: Scrape a webpage or research anything
upload.scrapeSubtitle: Paste a URL to extract content, or ask any question — powered by Gemini AI.
upload.scrapePlaceholder: URL or query, e.g. "nail salons without a website in Berlin"
upload.aiWarning: ⚠ AI-generated summary — always verify facts like addresses, phone numbers, and prices directly on the source website.

erase.title: Erase indexed docs
erase.subtitle: Sends a delete request to your n8n workflow to clear the current RAG index. Make sure your erase webhook is wired before using this.
erase.success: Erase request sent to n8n. The RAG index will be cleared according to your workflow.
erase.error: Failed to erase docs. Check the n8n erase webhook and try again.

uploadHistory.title: Upload history (this browser)
uploadHistory.noUploads: You haven't uploaded anything from this device yet. Your next uploads will appear here.
uploadHistory.bestWith: Best with PDF itineraries, plans, and shared docs.
uploadHistory.useChat: Use the Chat page to ask questions once uploaded.
